title: SuperCowVSAliens
description: Meet SuperCow. The one cow trying to save the grass from being burned by Aliens.
notes: You can change game properties in the constants.py. The game is upside down due to the game engine which does not have a rotation issue. And my math skills aren't good enough to figure some proper way to rotate the whole thing. Have a go at it if you want to :) The file to update is the _game C code.
author: James
